text: Tako mlada () is the debut studio album by Serbian pop-folk singer Tanja Savić. It was released 16 June 2005 through the Belgrade-based record label Grand Production. ==Background== Tanja Savić became famous in 2004 while competing on the first season of the Zvezde Granda television singing contest and making it into the final six. ==Singles== The title song was released as the album's lead single in 2005. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2005 albums Category:Tanja Savić albums Category:Grand Production albums
title: Tako mlada
